author: timbeiko
content:
**AllCoreDevs this Friday 14:00 UTC**
Agenda: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/blob/master/README.md#acd-107-march-5-2021
Stream: https://youtu.be/xWfR-WxjmYg

To add an item to an agenda, please open an issue in the ethereum/pm repository which mentions the topic you want to discuss, when you would like to discuss it (doesn't have to be this week's call), the amount of time you think you will need and links any relevant materials (EIPs, prototypes, etc.) ðŸ˜„

Things already on the Agenda:
- Berlin updates
- London EIPs (so far, EIP-1559, EIP-3298 (disabling gas refunds) and EIP-3238 (difficulty bomb pushback) have been proposed)
